cause.description:
Partnership Walk is an annual event sponsored by the AKF-USA organization. (Aga Khan Foundation.) The walk sends all of the money it raises to AKF's projects to make sustainable solutions for poverty, hunger, illiteracy and ill-health especially in resource-poor areas and all around the world! This is your chance to make a difference in the world! But remember, the benefit will only be as large as you want it to be! Plzz spread the word!
http://www.dosomething.org/node/25324 This link has all the info you will need about the walk and a lot more on other ways you can volunteer! Please look at their causes, there may be one that really interests you! Everyone tells us we're the next generation, so lets start making the world a better place now!
1. As humans it is our duty to help others.
2. Everyone in the world deserves a chance.
3. No one should live in hunger, bad health, poverty or without an education
cause.mission: Recruit participants and raise money for the walk! The walk will be held this year on Sunday, October 14th in Chicago, Dallas, and Los Angeles and on Saturday, November 10th in Atlanta and Houston!
cause.name: Partnership Walk 2007!
